title: Brunschwig Recipes - Curated with Detailed Procedural Steps
notes: Each recipe manually verified against source OCR. Procedural steps extracted as discrete actions. | Sensory modality classified (temp_classify_sensory.py)

action_taxonomy._note: v2.0 (2026-02-06): Expanded from 11 to 33 actions after manual audit of original German text. See BRSC v2.0 for full documentation.
action_taxonomy.GATHER: Collecting/selecting plant parts or materials (gesamlet, genummen)
action_taxonomy.SELECT: Carefully sorting best specimens (erleſen, vß geleſen)
action_taxonomy.CHOP: Cutting into small pieces (gehackt, clein gehackt, zerhackt)
action_taxonomy.STRIP: Separating parts from each other (gestreifft) - e.g. leaves from stems
action_taxonomy.BREAK: Breaking off parts (ab gebrochen) - e.g. flower tips
action_taxonomy.PLUCK: Plucking feathers from birds (geropffet) - animal only
action_taxonomy.BORE: Boring/drilling a hole (bore ein loch) - for sap extraction
action_taxonomy.KILL: Kill animal by strangling, not cutting (würg, doͤtten)
action_taxonomy.CLEAN: Remove unwanted parts like fat (thü daruon alle feiſtikeit)
action_taxonomy.MACERATE: Soak in liquid overnight to days (gebeiſſet, in wyn gebeiſſet)
action_taxonomy.DIGEST: Controlled gentle heating in sealed vessel (digerieren)
action_taxonomy.REDISTILL: Distill again for higher quality (zum andern mal gediſtilliert)
action_taxonomy.SEAL: Seal vessel with luting compound (verlutiert, verckeibt, verſtopfft)
action_taxonomy.REGULATE: Control heat via air vents (verſtopff das wynt loch)
action_taxonomy.MONITOR_DRIPS: Count drip rate for process control (wie die glock ſchlecht)
action_taxonomy.MONITOR_TEMP: Finger test for water bath temp (ein finger dar in gelyden)
action_taxonomy.REPLENISH: Refill water bath with warm water (warm waſſer wider fülleſt)
action_taxonomy.COOL: Let cool passively overnight, mandatory (laſſen kalt werden)
action_taxonomy.FILTER: Filter through felt cloth (durch ein filtz, gelütert)
action_taxonomy.RECTIFY: Purify in sun 40 days or by redistillation (rectificieren)
action_taxonomy.SETTLE: Let sediment sink with vinegar drops (dꝛiebe an den boden)
action_taxonomy.POUR: Pour liquid over herbs or into vessel (güß, gegoſſen)
action_taxonomy.SEAL_VESSEL: Seal storage vessel with plug and leather (verſtopfft, verbunden)
action_taxonomy.LABEL: Attach lead label with contents/date (blihen bꝛieff)
action_taxonomy.STORE: Store in appropriate conditions (behalten, in keller gſetzt)
action_taxonomy.RENEW: Re-infuse old water with fresh herbs annually (ernüwert)
action_taxonomy.STEEP: Soaking in liquid (legacy term, see MACERATE)

metadata.BRUNSCHWIG_ANECDOTE: In 1466 in Würzburg (Mcccc.lxvi), a goldsmith named Jerg Ziechel who made hollow golden rings could engrave a whole lion on a broken needle point (ein gantzen löwen graben) with complete detail - when asked how his eyesight was so sharp, he said he ate valerian root powder daily (wurtzel von denmarck zu puluer alle tag vff einer bonen groß gessen)
metadata.ARTISAN_PRECISION: This anecdote documents the incredible fine-motor precision of 15th century craftsmen

metadata.KOBLENZ_INSANITY_CURE: In 1491 (M.cccc.xi) in Koblenz (Roblentz), a schoolmaster studied so hard he went out of his mind (von sinnen kam) and had to be restrained (man in binden müst). An unlearned empiric (vngelerter embericus) gave him the water to drink and the chopped herb to eat - within 3 weeks of constant use he was completely healthy and sane again, and studied more than ever before (viel me studiert wann vor nye)
metadata.DUKE_OF_YORK_DAUGHTER: Hans Heinrich, physician to the Queen of England, told Brunschwig that the Duke of York's daughter (16 years old) was so weak and unconscious that all doctors gave up. He gave her 1.5 quintlin of finest pearls + gold sealed fine gold mixed with 2 lot of the best ochsenzung water - within an hour she opened her eyes, sighed, and eventually recovered
metadata.STRASBOURG_BOY: Brunschwig was called to a Strasbourg citizen's dying 8-year-old son who couldn't speak. He gave sugar, pearls, gold leaf + ochsenzung water every 2-3 hours. The child ate nothing else for 3+ weeks, couldn't speak for 3-4 weeks, but eventually recovered completely
metadata.CORDIAL_SUPREME: This is clearly positioned as a supreme cordial/heart medicine - multiple royal and clinical cases
metadata.PERSONAL_TESTIMONY: Brunschwig says 'Ich selber gesehen hab' (I myself have seen) the Koblenz case

recipes.uses_summary: A: KIDNEY STONES (steyn) - drink 30-40 days, 3-4 lot morning/evening. B: POISON (vergifft) - drink 4-5 days, 5-6 lot morning/evening, expels it. C: PROMOTES URINATION + cleanses bladder/kidneys and stone sites. D: WASP/SPIDER STINGS (wespen/spinnen gestochen) - wash + apply cloths. E: TOOTH ABSCESS (zan geschwer) - hold in mouth often. F: DROPSY (wassersucht) - drink 3-4 weeks, 3 lot morning/evening - makes water pass in urine, but must limit drinking ('ye mynder er trinckr ye mer er harnet'). G: JAUNDICE (gelsücht/ictericia) - drink 2-3 weeks, 2-3 lot morning/evening. H: THREADWORMS (spülm würm) - drink 3-4 days fasting, 3-4 lot, kills them. I/J: AIDS DIGESTION (macht den magen wol döuwen) - drink 3-4 lot 2-3x/day. K: COOLS HOT SWELLINGS (kület die heisse geschwulst) - resolves and consumes them, apply cloth. L: CLEANSES STOMACH of slimy phlegm + whatever hinders digestion - drink 5-6 days, 2-4 lot morning/evening. M: OPENS BLOCKAGES of internal organs and veins (vertsopffung der innern glidern vnd der adern). N: WEAKENS STOMACH and reduces appetite - but consumes other bad food in stomach. O: POISONOUS MUSHROOMS (böse schedliche schwammen) - drink 3-4 lot fasting, consumes and digests them. P: THINS gross slimy phlegm in lungs - drink 3 lot 3x/day. Q: SPLEEN SWELLING (geschwulst des miltzs). R: CORNEAL OPACITY (füchtigkeit in cornea der ougen) that causes blindness - dissolves it. S: FACIAL SPOTS (flecken in dem angesicht) - wash often, let dry. T: YELLOW FACIAL SPOTS and jaundice of limbs - apply often, let dry. U: THROAT ABSCESS (geschwer im halss sauinancia/quinsy) - gargle often, resolves it. V: CLEARS VOICE (lütert die stim) - drink 2 lot 3x/day. X: CLEANSES CHEST and thins gross slimy phlegm in chest and lungs - drink 3 lot 2x/day. Y: WARM and DRY nature - thins, opens, strips, cleanses - good for IMPETIGO and SERPIGO, wash morning/evening. Z: DEADLY POISON antidote - drink 3 lot 4-5 days. AA: SCORPION STINGS (stechen der scorpion) - wash morning/evening + apply cloths, kills them. BB: QUARTAN and STRONG FEVERS (vierteglich febres vnd den starcken ritten) that shake person - drink 2-3 lot 2x/day. CC: INCREASES LUST and sexual desire (meret den lust vnd bewegt zu luxurueren) - drink 2 lot 2x/day. DD: PROMOTES MENSTRUATION (bewegt den frouwen ire kranckeit das ist das menstruum) - drink 2 lot 2x/day. EE/FF/GG: KIDNEY STONES (rysen steyn) - drink 3 lot morning/evening

recipes.uses_summary: A: WONDERFUL PROPERTIES for body - useful in all COLD diseases, strengthens spirit and innate warmth, soul delights in it - drink 1.5-2 lot with equal wine morning/evening. B: STRENGTHENS BRAIN and all veins, internal organs, face, whole body - drink + wash face + rub limbs, makes person YOUTHFULLY FORMED. C: STRENGTHENS SENSES, MEMORY, UNDERSTANDING - drink + apply to head, warms head, consumes phlegm and melancholy. D: EXCESSIVE SWEATING (zu vil schwitzt) causing weakness - wash head and chest 3x/day, relieved from foul sweat. E: LOST APPETITE - drink 7-10 days morning and bedtime, 2-3 lot + wash mouth, hunger returns. F: INCREASES BONE MARROW (meret vnd wermet das marck in den beynen) - rub 4-5 weeks 2-3x/day. G: SWOLLEN SHINS/KNEES from dropsy or abscess (schinbein/knüw schiben geschwollen) - apply cloths 2-3 weeks. H: SMALL ARTERIES (cleyne ederlin arteria) - revives and opens blocked passages of spirit - drink 2-3 weeks 2-3x/day, 2 lot. I: PLAGUE (pestilentz) - drink 2 lot fasting. J/K: PURIFIES BLOOD - drink 2-3 months every other day, 1-2 lot. L: DIFFICULT BREATHING, COUGH, WHEEZING - drink 4-5 weeks. M: MAKES COURAGEOUS (macht den menschen hertzhafftig) - strengthens heart substance, good for heart pain - drink 3 lot morning. N: TREMBLING (beben) - drink 3 lot morning/evening until healthy. O: STRENGTHENS TONGUE + makes speak well (macht wol reden) - 'nobody can speak all its praise, unbelievable how many virtues it has'. P: CLEARS COMPLEXION (luter angesicht) - wash face morning/evening. Q: PRESERVES HAIR (behalt es das hor) - wash head, strengthens and increases hair. R: PROTECTS from ANTHRAX plague boils - drink + wash. S: HEALS FISTULAS - wash morning/evening. T: RESTORES YOUTH (macht überkummen iungheit) - constant use mixed in drink + rubbed externally, body does not age except over very long time. U: TEETH and GUMS - wash mouth often, heals cancer and fistula in mouth. V/X: HEALS WOUNDS and ULCERS - dries them, wash morning/evening. Y: NAUSEA and INTESTINAL FLUX (vnwillen vnd flüsse des buchs) - drink 2 lot morning/evening. Z: PALSY/PARALYSIS (parlitico/berliss) and TREMBLING LIMBS and craftsmen (hantfertiger) - rub limbs morning/evening. AA: EXPELS ALL POISON like theriac - drink 3 lot. BB: UTERUS problems + AIDS CONCEPTION (gut zu der entpfahung der frowen) - drink 1-2 lot 2-3x/day, can make bath from decoction = 'bath of life' (bad des lebens) that delays aging and renews person. (Special) SOLAR BALSAM: Fill glass with rosemary flowers, bury half in sand for month+ until flowers become water, set in sun 40 days = becomes clear with power of balsam, strengthens heart and whole body. CC-KK: (various additional uses including weak heart from cold)

recipes.uses_summary: A: BAD LIVER (böse leber) - drink 2-3 lot morning/evening for 18 days. B: SUPPRESSES LUST (vertribt vnküsckeit) - drink 4-5 lot early morning. C: BAD SPLEEN, LIVER, STOMACH (böse miltz vnd lebern vnd magen) - drink 2 lot 2x/day. D: VOMITING and STOMACH UPSET (erbrechen vnd vffstossung des magens) - drink 4 lot 3x/day + mix in drinks. E: HELPS LUNGS (kumpt zehilff der lungen). F: SWELLING in chest/ribs (geschwulst in der brust vnd vnder den rippen) - softens chest. G: WIND in belly/body (wind im buch vnd lyb) - drink 2-3 lot 2x/day. H: HOT GOUT (gesücht das von hitzen kumpt) - rub + apply cloths morning/evening. I/J: HELPS INTESTINES (kumpt zehilff dem yngeweld) - drink 3 lot 2-3x/day. K: BAD EYES - expels films and spots, clarifies and makes sight so sharp 'he will see stars by day as by night' - drops + drink 2 lot daily. L: DRIES and CLEANSES eyes of all sliminess. M: VERTIGO (schwindeln im houpt) - drink 2-3 lot 2x/day. N: DROPSY (wassersüchtigen) - drink 30-40 days, 3 lot morning/evening. O: CRAMPS (krampff) - rub morning/evening, let dry. P: HEAD SWELLING (geschwulst des houpt) - apply cloths 2-3x/day. Q: PALSY (parlis) - drink 3 lot 2-3x/day + rub limbs. R: SCABIES (rüde) - drink 2-3 lot 2-3x/day. S: UNNATURAL COLD (vnnatürlich kelte) - rub limbs + apply cloths. T: NASAL POLYP (polipus nasis) - wash + insert soaked swabs morning/evening. U: TREMBLING of limbs (zittern der glider) - rub 2x/day, let dry. V: PLAGUE (pestilentz) - drink 2-3 lot early morning. X: HEAD ABSCESSES (apostemen des houbts) - sniff into nose. Y: THREADWORMS (spül würm) - drink 2-3 lot fasting 2-3 mornings. Z: LABOR/CHILDBIRTH (kinds in arbeit geent) - drink 2 lot, EXPELS the birth - WARNING: harmful to pregnant women before due time! AA: CLEANSES MENSTRUATION (subert die frowen an ir sücht menstruum) - drink 3 lot 4-5 days. BB: COUGH (husten) - drink 2-3 lot 2-3 days, 2-3x/day. CC: FINGER JOINT PAIN (schmertzen der gleich vor ab der finger) - apply cloths, especially with whitlow. DD: RUMBLING in belly (brodelen in buch) - drink 2 lot fasting. EE: STOPS DIARRHEA (stellt den fluss des bucks/stulgang). FF: DYSENTERY (rutten) - drink 2-3 lot 10-11 days morning/evening. GG: (OCR damaged). HH: POISON antidote (vergifft) - drink 6 lot 2-3 days fasting. II: STRENGTHENS NERVES and VEINS (sterckt die neruos vn adern) - rub often 6-8 days. JJ/KK: ROTTING MOUTH and GUMS (mund den die do fulzen/zan fleisch fulen) - wash mouth 2x/day. LL: VEIN PAIN (schmertzen der adern) - rub + apply cloths 2x/day. MM: MAD DOG BITE (biss des dobenden oder vnsinnigen hunds) - drink 3 lot morning/evening + wash + apply cloths. NN: ALL VENOMOUS ANIMAL BITES (allerhand vergifftiger thyer biss) - apply 2x/day, can substitute for theriac. OO: DEVIL PROTECTION (welchs mensch das hat in sim huss dem mag der tüfel nit wol schaden) - having it in house protects from devil! PP: EPILEPSY (vallenden siechtagen) - drink 4 lot 30-40 days. QQ: LIMB PAIN (kranckheit oder wetagen der glider) - apply cloths morning/evening. RR: PROMOTES MENSTRUATION (bringt den frowen ir zit) - drink 2-3 lot morning/evening

recipes.uses_summary: A: JOINT FLUID (glidwasser) - warm the water, apply warm to wounds with cotton wool 2x/day. B: HEALS CUT VEINS in wounds (verhouwende adern in den wunden) - apply cloths morning/evening. C: MAKES FLESH GROW in wounds (macht fleysch in den wunden wachsend). D: ALL EYE PAIN (alle wetagen der ougen) - add a little camphor, put in eyes 1 hour before night. E: STAB WOUNDS through intestines (durch stochen/durch das gederm) - drink 3 lot 2x/day, heals immediately. F: CLOTTED/BRUISED BLOOD (gerunnen vn gequetschet blut) or internal bleeding from stab wounds - drink to expel and consume the blood. G: BROKEN BONES (ein bein zerbrochen ist) - helps bones heal back together

metadata.COLLECTION_METHOD: Elaborate: soak onions overnight, pour water on manured soil to lure worms out, then put in moss to clean by crawling through

recipes.uses_summary: A: UNNATURAL HEAT (vnnatürlich hitz) - drink 3-4 lot 2-3x/day + mix in drinks. B: COUGH (husten). C: PLAGUE (pestilentz) - drink 2 lot fasting. D: POISON in body (vergifft) causing abscess or swelling - drink 2 lot 2-3x/day. E: ALL REDNESS and ULCERS of eyes (alle rote in den ougen vn geschwer der ougen) - apply cloth, draws out redness, makes clear and bright, prevents suppuration. F: CONSTIPATION (gezwangk/nit mag zu stulgang) - drink 6-7 lot fasting. G: INTESTINAL GOUT (derm geyicht) - drink 3 lot 3x/day. H: CANNOT RETAIN FOOD (spise nit behalten mag) - drink in same manner. I: DIFFICULTY URINATING (nit bruntzen oder harnen mag) - drink 5-6 lot 4-5 days morning/evening. J: KIDNEY STONES (stein) - drink 30-40 days, 3-4 lot morning/evening, expels. K: GRAVEL in loins/kidneys/bladder (grüen in den lenden/nyeren/blosen) - drink 4 lot 3x/day 5-6 days. L: UNNATURAL HEAT causing weakness/fainting - COMPOUND REMEDY: 2 lot larkspur water + 1 lot each red rose water and borage water + 0.5 lot plantain water, give morning/evening - dispels heat and weakness together

recipes.uses_summary: A: STRENGTHENS and COOLS brain, heart, stomach, principal organs (hirn/hertz/magen/principalischen glider) - protects from dissolution, restores strength with fragrant power and astringency. B: STRENGTHENS SPIRIT and innate warmth (geyist vnd angeborn wermbd), protects from putrefaction. C: DYSENTERY and DIARRHEA (dissenteria blut rür/lienteria wyss rür) - drink 3-4 lot morning/evening, from retention weakness. D: FAINTING, VOMITING, EXCESSIVE SWEATING (geschwinde/amechtigkeit/kotzen/geschwyndenen schweiss) - drink same manner. E: TEETH and GUMS (zen vnd büeler) - wash + rub morning/evening, strengthens and gives good breath. F: STRENGTHENS GUMS and colors mouth well (macht das fleisch starck/mundt wol geferbt) - wash mouth. G: EYES - mix with wine, cleanses/dries/strengthens eyes; can compound with tutia preparata, aloe paticum, sugar candy for even better effect; or just rose water + white sugar candy strips and cleanses eye substance. H: (Meta) Better than heath rose for all weakness/fainting conditions, but use heath rose when cooling needed with strengthening. I: SORE EYES from heat (sere ougen hat von hitz) - drops in eyes + apply cloth for swelling/redness from blood in head. J/K: STRENGTHENS HEAD - drink 2 lot fasting. L: COLD and DRY nature - prevents humors from affecting eyes, clarifies - put in eyes 1 hour before night + apply around eyes. M: VERTIGO (schwindeln) - mix with wine, drink 6 lot, strengthens liver with hot hard obstruction. N: WHITE and RED DIARRHEA (rür wyss vnd rot) - drink 4 lot 3x/day. O: STOPS BLEEDING from wounds and nose - apply cloth/tow. P: COUGH from hot humors (husten von heissen humores) and throat heat - drink same manner. AA: GOOD COMPLEXION (gute farb). BB: SPEECH IMPROVEMENT - heals moisture from tongue, makes speaking easier. CC: HIDDEN ULCERS in private parts - consumes and scatters them. DD: STOMACH STRENGTHENING with cleansing and wiping. EE: TERTIAN FEVER and EPILEPSY (fallend such). FF: PLAGUE and PESTILENCE (drusen vnd pestilentz). GG: POISON ANTIDOTE - opium or henbane (iusquiamum/magsat milch/bulsen). HH: GESTATION/PREGNANCY problems (geburt). II: MOUTH FISTULA PREVENTION - wash mouth to prevent fistulas. recipes.uses_summary: A: PARALYSIS (paralasis) - wash affected limbs, drives it out. B: FRESH WOUNDS - apply cloths, heals excellently; TESTIFIED by Hans, parson of Würzburg, a famous wound-doctor! C: MOUTH SORES (scheunden an den lefftzen) - wash often. D: WARNING: too strong to drink alone unless wounded; for ruptured people mix with wine 2-3 lot. E: HOT GOUT - rub limbs 3x/day with cloths. F: ERYSIPELAS (wild fuer) - apply in same manner. G: ALL SWELLING - apply cloths 2-3x daily. H: WOUND BLEEDING - soak cotton wool (bouwol) in water, apply to fresh wound to stop bleeding; also drink 2-3 lot 2x/day. I: BROKEN BONES - drink 3 lot 3x/day helps bones heal when properly splinted. K: HERNIA (ruptura) - principal remedy when properly bound with truss (lidener)

metadata.WOUND_SPECIALIST: Multiple uses for wounds, bleeding, hernias - classic 'consolida' (healing) plant

metadata.ALSO_CALLED: German: wyden, wilgen, felber
metadata.YOUNG_SHOOTS: Emphasizes using leaves from shoots that emerged this year (erst das iar)

recipes.timing: Same as apple blossom (Chapter O) and peach blossom (Chapter P)
recipes.uses_summary: A: FACIAL PROBLEMS (gesiecht) - apply cloths 2-3x daily for several days until healed. B: HEAD SORES (grint) - wash head often, let dry naturally. C: HAIR BEAUTIFIER - makes hair beautiful and nice (schon vnd hubsch); wash and brush 2-3x daily, let dry naturally. D: SKIN HEALING

metadata.CROSS_REFERENCE: Distillation instructions reference earlier chapters: 'als ich geschriben hab in dem buchstaben O von den opfel bluet vnd in dem P von pfyrsich bluet'
metadata.COSMETIC_FOCUS: Primarily cosmetic uses - face, head sores, hair beautification
metadata.ALSO_CALLED: German: wilgen bluet, wyss felber bluet (white felber blossom)

recipes.uses_summary: A: ERYSIPELAS (hellisch fuer) - one of the COLDEST waters available; apply linen cloth externally - quenches the fire. B: BREAST SIZE CONTROL - young women who want smaller breasts apply this water and cloths - prevents excessive growth. C: CHILDREN'S HERNIA (bruch der kynd hermiosus) - apply cloths morning/evening. D: HOT DROPSY (hitzig wassersucht) - apply cloths 2x/day winter, 3x/day summer. E: HOT GOUT/DROPSY (hytzigen dropfen) - apply 3-4 folded cloths; **WARNING: DO NOT DRINK - it is a cold poison (von den geschlechten der kalten gyfft)**. F: SWALLOWED FLY - if someone swallowed a fly, drink 1 lot morning fasting to expel it alive

metadata.POISON_WARNING: Use E contains explicit warning: 'huet dich das du wuntscherling wasser nit in nemest wann es ist von den geschlechten der kalten gyfft' - DO NOT INGEST, it is a cold poison
metadata.NAME_ETYMOLOGY: Called 'wutterich' (madman) because eating it makes you go mad (wuten wurt); also 'scherling'
metadata.COLDEST_WATER: Described as 'der kaltest wasser eins das man haben mag' - one of the coldest waters possible
metadata.EXTERNAL_ONLY: All uses except F are EXTERNAL application only due to toxicity
metadata.BRUNSCHWIG_PENS: Brunschwig notes he made quill pens from the hollow stems (4.5 ells tall): 'ich oft schrib federn gemacht hab textur da mit zu schriben'
metadata.BREAST_REDUCTION: Use B: unusual cosmetic/medical use for young women wanting smaller breasts
metadata.FLY_SWALLOWING: Use F: bizarre but specific - expels swallowed flies alive when drunk fasting
metadata.FAMOUS_POISON: This is the poison that killed Socrates (Conium maculatum)

recipes.uses_summary: A: STOMACH HEAT - drink 2 lot 3x/day with regular drink. B: HEART and STOMACH STRENGTHENING - drink and apply cloths over heart. C: HOT LIVER - apply hemp wadding soaked in water 3x/day. D: PLAGUE PREVENTION - drink 3-4 lot protects against pestilence. E: BLACK PLAGUE SORES (schwartzen blottern) - drink and apply cloths every 8 hours. F: ERYSIPELAS (hellisch fuer) - quenches it. G: LUNG PROBLEMS (lung in die kel wachset) - drink 3 lot often. H: HEART STRENGTHENING - drink 3-4 lot 3x/day. I: DYSENTERY (buch fluss dissenteria) - drink 3 lot 3x/day stops bloody flux. K: UVULA SWELLING (blat) - gargle and drink often. L: LUNG in throat. metadata.PLAGUE_REMEDY: Multiple uses specifically against plague and pestilence (D, E)

C: EYE SPOTS and FILMS (fel vnd flecken der ougen). D: EYE GROWTH (nagel in den ougen) and other eye problems - apply at evening 1 hour before sleep, rub around eyes. recipes.uses_summary: A: ALL SWELLING internal and external - drink 2-3 lot morning/evening, apply doubled linen cloths until healed. NOBLEST WATER for swelling! B: LEPROUS-LOOKING FACE (morpheisch antlyt) - apply soft linen cloths, re-wet when dry, makes face beautiful. C: LUNG in throat - drink 3 lot morning/evening. D: HOT GOUT (heiss geyicht) - nothing better for this! E: BURNS (brant) - PROVEN remedy; apply doubled cloth immediately, re-wet when dry until healed. F: BITING SCABIES (byssende rud) wet or dry - apply cloths 3x/day, draws out burning without harm. G: ECZEMA (schon) - apply soft cloth, re-wet when dry, draws out burning without harm or scarring. recipes.uses_summary: A: DIARRHEA (uber flussigen stul gang) - drink 3-4 lot 3x/day, stops excessive stool. B: ERYSIPELAS (wild fuer) - apply cloths or wadding. C: HEAT RASH - drink and apply externally. D: WOUND PAIN and wound infection (wunt sucht) - wash wounds and apply cloths, heals from bottom up, very good. E: EAR PAIN - apply water lukewarm into ears. F: KIDNEY CLEANSING - cleanses kidneys of gravel, promotes urine, opens blockage; root is diuretic, very useful mixed with other waters. G: WORMS - drink 2 lot fasting (child), 2-3 lot (middle person), 3 lot (adult). H: ROTTING GUM FLESH (fulen zan flisch) - wash with it. metadata.NAME_ETYMOLOGY: Called 'centum nodia' (hundred knots) because stems have many nodes/joints; also 'lingua paserina' because tiny leaves like a sparrow's tongue; 'sanguinaria' (blood herb) because holding it in hand while looking at it with feverish eyes stops bleeding through imagination!
metadata.DOCTRINE_OF_SIGNATURES: Remarkable passage about stopping bleeding through visualization while holding the herb - early mind-body medicine
metadata.CONFUSION_NOTED: Brunschwig notes some call shepherd's purse (bursa pastoris) 'sanguinaria' but this is different

C: BEAUTIFUL FACE - wash face, let dry naturally; removes impurities, spots, and blemishes (mosen); also works on whole body if washed 2x/day for 3-4 weeks. metadata.FALSE_NAMES: Notes ivy (edera) and periwinkle (peruinca/ingruen) are sometimes wrongly called 'winter gruen' - Brunschwig corrects: 'es ist aber falsch' - every peasant names herbs as he pleases!

recipes.uses_summary: A: EYE REDNESS/HEAT (weragen der ougen) - apply 1 hour before sleep, draws out redness. B: BEAUTIFUL HANDS and FACE - wash 2x/day, makes skin clear, white, pure, beautiful. C: WEAKNESS/FAINTING (omechtikeit on schwacheit) - drink 3 lot morning/evening. D: HEART HEAT - drink as above. E: LIVER HEAT - drink as above. K: BAD MOISTURE and CHEST TIGHTNESS - drink 3-4 lot 7-10 days morning/evening. O: UTERUS PAIN (muter we) - drink 2-3 lot 6-7 days (except during menstruation). P: LUNG INFECTION - drink 2-3 lot 2-3 days. I: LOST SPEECH (sprach gelegen) - drink 2-3 lot 2-3 days, speech returns. K: DROPSY (wassersucht) - drink 3-4 lot 5-40 days, avoid other drinks. L: CHILDBIRTH AID (kyndes in arbeit) - helps women give birth more easily, opens passages, drives out birth gently; dose by woman's strength: weak 2.5-3 lot, middle 3.5-4 lot, strong 4.5-5 lot. O: HEAD FLUX (starck floss in dem houbt) - drink 2 lot 5-6 days, rub head. P: INTERNAL ABSCESS - drink 3 lot 3x/day. Q: BODY IMPURITY including LEPROSY (ussetzigkeit) - drink 2 lot long time 2x/day, wash body often. R: CLARIFIES WINE - add 1/4 measure to barrel of cloudy wine, makes it clear! S: FRECKLES - wash face often, let dry naturally. X: EXPELS DEAD FETUS - drink 3 lot 2-3 days. Y: FACIAL SPOTS - wash often. Z: IMPETIGO and SERPIGO - without honey. AA: FIRE BURNS - wash morning/evening, apply cloths. BB: VENOMOUS ANIMAL BITES - wash and apply cloths. CC: EXCESSIVE LUST in women - drink 2 lot, calms it. DD: BRINGS MENSTRUATION - drink 3 lot 2x/day. EE: EXCESSIVE MENSTRUATION - mix with rose water, apply to private area. FF: FACIAL WRINKLES - wash often, stretches skin with tempered warmth, removes wrinkles!

metadata.HERMODACTYLUS_CONFUSION: Notes another plant called 'wild saffron' (hermodactylus) because its flower resembles true saffron - also called 'zytlosen' or 'quelcken wurtzeln'
metadata.MARIGOLD_DISTINCTION: This is NOT the marigold (masslieb) which is also sometimes called 'zytlosen'

recipes.uses_summary: A: PURGES MELANCHOLY and PROMOTES STOOL - drink 1 quintin mixed with 3 lot wine in the morning early when clock strikes 2, fast until clock strikes 9; powerfully purges melancholy and causes bowel movement

metadata.CHAPTER_X_START: First recipe of Chapter X (Das XXI capitel)
metadata.NAME_ETYMOLOGY: Called 'xpi wurtz' (Christ's root), 'lieberlei', or 'schwartz niess wurtz' (black sneezewort) because powdering it causes sneezing
metadata.TIMING_SPECIFIC: Very precise timing: drink when clock strikes 2am, fast until 9am
metadata.PURGATIVE: Strong purgative action on melancholy (black bile)
metadata.ROOT_VS_HERB: Root and herb have OPPOSITE effects - root promotes stool, herb stops it (see recipe 240)

recipes.name_english: christmas rose herb water / black hellebore herb water
recipes.uses_summary: A: STOPS DIARRHEA and PRESERVES HEALTH - has OPPOSITE nature to root water; drinking it stops bowel movements while root water promotes them. Good for preserving bodily health when drunk every morning fasting, half or whole lot. **REMARKABLE LONGEVITY TESTIMONY: Brunschwig saw a man named Claus Holant of Strasbourg who lived 130 YEARS taking this herb as powder (nut-sized amount) daily, always staying healthy until his natural death!**

metadata.OPPOSITE_NATURE: Explicitly noted 'widerwertige natur gegen der wurtzeln wasser' - opposite nature to root water
metadata.130_YEAR_OLD_MAN: REMARKABLE: Claus Holant of Strasbourg lived 130 years (hundert vnd xxx iaren) taking this herb daily as powder! Brunschwig personally saw him ('ich hab gesehen')
metadata.HEALTH_PRESERVATIVE: Used preventively for longevity and health preservation
metadata.POWDER_FORM: Claus Holant took it as powder (pulueren) in nut-sized amounts (grosse einer nuß), licking it from his hand
metadata.LATIN_TERM: Brunschwig uses Latin 'labenda' (licking) to describe consumption method

recipes.uses_summary: A: ALL CHEST DISEASES - excellently good; softens chest, widens around chest, strengthens and fortifies chest; drink 2-3 lot 3x/day. B: COUGH - strengthens and fortifies lungs, good for all lung diseases; drink as above. C: HOARSENESS - clears and makes voice bright and clear; drink as above

recipes.uses_summary: A: KIDNEY STONES - drink 3-4 lot morning/evening, excellently good for stones. B: DRY COUGH (durren husten) - drink in same manner

metadata.CHAPTER_Y_START: First recipe of Chapter Y (Das XXII capitel)
metadata.NAME_ETYMOLOGY: Called 'ye lenger ye lieber' (the longer the sweeter) because when chewed, it starts bitter but becomes sweeter the longer you chew; hence 'bitter suss' (bittersweet)
metadata.ALSO_CALLED: Also 'hinsch krut' because hung on cattle against disease - though some wrongly say 'osterlucey' (birthwort) is 'hinsch krut'
metadata.MIDDLE_BARK: Specifically the 'Corticum medium' (middle bark) is used - outer bark removed

recipes.uses_summary: A: RESTORES SPEECH after animal bite or worm/insect bite that caused loss of speech - drink 1 lot 3-5 times, helps those who can no longer speak. B: HEADACHE - draw into nose or pour in, drives away head heaviness. C: TOOTHACHE PREVENTION - wash and rub teeth every morning, they will never hurt again. D: HAIR GROWTH - rub bald head daily, bald head becomes covered with hair again. E: WORMS - drink 2-3 lot fasting in morning, drives out intestinal worms

metadata.TWO_TYPES: Common onions (gemeinen zybeln) and sea onion/squill (mor zybel/muss zybel) - grows near sea, water with them in it kills mice who drink it!
metadata.SPEECH_RESTORER: Remarkable use A: restores speech lost from animal/insect bites
metadata.HAIR_RESTORER: Use D: daily application restores hair to bald heads
metadata.MOUSE_KILLER: Notes squill onion water kills mice - hence 'muss zybel' (mouse onion)

recipes.uses_summary: A: APPETITE STIMULANT (vnlustig ist zu essen) - drink 3-4 lot 3x/day when lacking appetite. B: BROKEN RIBS/BONES (rippen oder bein zerbrochen) - drink 2 lot morning/evening. C: WOUND HEALING - drink 3-4 lot morning/evening, wash wounds. D: BOWEL SOFTENING - drink 6 lot, softens bowels. E: LIMB LAMENESS (lamigkeit der glyder) - wash and rub morning/evening. F: INTESTINAL DAMAGE (versert gederm) - drink 2 lot 2x/day, heals damaged intestines

metadata.NAME_ETYMOLOGY: Called 'zytlosen' because it flowers first in spring (glentzen); also 'masslieblin' - commonly known to many

metadata.EARLY_FLOWERING: First flower of spring - hence 'timeless' or 'seasonless' (zytlosen)
metadata.BONE_HEALER: Use B specifically for broken ribs and bones

recipes.name_english: bryony root water / wild vine root water
recipes.uses_summary: A: GOUT/PODAGRA (das podagra od fuss gesucht) - rub feet. B: BAD STOMACH - drink 2 lot morning fasting, cleanses stomach. C: PURGATIVE - drink 8 lot fasting when clock strikes 3, fast until 9, causes bowel movement. D: ERYSIPELAS/WILD FIRE (heilige fer oder das wild fuer / ignis persica) - apply 3-4 folded cloths, re-wet when dry until quenched. E: FACIAL SPOTS (masen vnd rot flecken) - wash often. F: FRECKLES (rusemelin) under eyes - wash often, let dry. H: RED/INFLAMED FACE (rotten vff zugigen antlyt) - wash, let dry. I: DIGESTION and THROAT PHLEGM - drink 3-4 lot 1-2x, aids digestion, removes phlegm from throat when rubbed externally. K: RUNNING GOUT and SWELLING (louffende geyicht vnd geschwulst) - apply cloths
